attributes.action: Get David Cameron to Invoke Article 50 with immediate effect (as promised).
attributes.additional_details:
The choice was simple, stay or leave, Cameron said if it was leave, he would invoke Article 50 on the very next day, he hasn't done that, and now he's stalling things. 

I urge everyone to sign this petition who voted to leave, the people have spoken, we have decided to leave, so let's leave!
attributes.background:
David Cameron gave us, the British people, a vote to decide whether we remain in the EU or Leave it.

Well the public voted and as we all know, the outcome was a majority in favour of leaving the EU. This wasn't a vote to renegotiate terms, nor was it a vote to hang around for a few months after!
